name: Ancestor's Chosen
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
When Ancestor's Chosen enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Empowered by generations of strength.

name: Aven Warcraft
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, choose a color. Creatures you control also gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

name: Battle Screech
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.
Flashback—Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Battlewise Aven
oracle_text: Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
flavor_text: Experience is a good teacher, not a kind one.

name: Benevolent Bodyguard
oracle_text: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."

name: Border Patrol
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text:
"We have been victims of treachery, of the Cabal, and of our own ambitions. No more."
—Commander Eesha

name: Cagemail
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't attack.
flavor_text:
"Power often costs too high a price."
—Commander Eesha

name: Chastise
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.
flavor_text:
"Why do we pray to the Ancestor? Because She listens."
—Mystic elder

name: Commander Eesha
oracle_text: Flying, protection from creatures
flavor_text: "War glides on the simplest updrafts while peace struggles against hurricane winds. It is the way of the world. It must change."

name: Funeral Pyre
oracle_text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Its owner creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text:
"Raze the body. Raise the soul."
—Mystic elder

name: Glory
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{W}: Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Glory is in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Glory was gone; Glory was everywhere."
—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Golden Wish
oracle_text: You may choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Golden Wish.
flavor_text: She wished for nobility, but not for a nation to honor it.

name: Guided Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"May the Ancestor strengthen my hand and guide my blade."
—Nomad war prayer

name: Lead Astray
oracle_text: Tap up to two target creatures.
flavor_text:
"Never underestimate our enemy's strength, brutality, . . . or stupidity."
—Commander Eesha

name: Nomad Mythmaker
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to a creature you control.
flavor_text: Nomads weave tales thicker than tapestries.

name: Phantom Flock
oracle_text: Flying
Phantom Flock enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Flock, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Flock.

name: Phantom Nomad
oracle_text: Phantom Nomad enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nomad, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nomad.

name: Prismatic Strands
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that sources of the color of your choice would deal this turn.
Flashback—Tap an untapped white creature you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Pulsemage Advocate
oracle_text: {T}: Return three target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Our unity revives our hopes."

name: Ray of Revelation
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Webs of illusion unravel in the light of truth.

name: Selfless Exorcist
oracle_text: {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. That card deals damage equal to its power to Selfless Exorcist.

name: Shieldmage Advocate
oracle_text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice.
flavor_text: "Our unity conquers all fears."

name: Silver Seraph
oracle_text: Flying
Threshold — Other creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text: A symbol of hope for hopeless times.

name: Solitary Confinement
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card.
Skip your draw step.
You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

name: Soulcatchers' Aerie
oracle_text: Whenever a Bird is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.
Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.

name: Spirit Cairn
oracle_text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {W}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: It marks the border between here and hereafter.

name: Spurnmage Advocate
oracle_text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor_text: "Our unity humbles our foes."

name: Suntail Hawk
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Our forebears once flew like this—carefree, needing nothing but a warm nest and a full belly. Our intellect may be more burden than blessing."
—Commander Eesha

name: Test of Endurance
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.
flavor_text:
"If we have learned nothing else, we have learned to survive."
—Mystic elder

name: Trained Pronghorn
oracle_text: Discard a card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Trained Pronghorn this turn.
flavor_text:
"The desert asked the Ancestor for children, and the antelope were born."
—Nomad myth

name: Unquestioned Authority
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.
flavor_text:
"Only the Ancestor should be revered."
—Mystic heretic

name: Valor
oracle_text: First strike
As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.
flavor_text:
"The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land."
—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Vigilant Sentry
oracle_text: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Vigilant Sentry gets +1/+1 and has "{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn."

name: Aven Fogbringer
oracle_text: Flying
When Aven Fogbringer enters the battlefield, return target land to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "I cover the land with blankets and it sleeps."

name: Cephalid Constable
oracle_text: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: Cephalids don't police people. They police loyalties.

name: Cephalid Inkshrouder
oracle_text: Discard a card: Cephalid Inkshrouder gains shroud until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. (A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: Cephalids shrink from the harsh glare of scrutiny.

name: Cunning Wish
oracle_text: You may choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Cunning Wish.
flavor_text: He wished for knowledge, but not for the will to apply it.

name: Defy Gravity
oracle_text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Flashback {U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Magical or not, it's still a cloud.

name: Envelop
oracle_text: Counter target sorcery spell.
flavor_text:
"What you made will be unmade. What you learned will be unlearned. And when you're done, you will be undone."
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Flash of Insight
oracle_text: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Flashback—{1}{U}, Exile X blue cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost, then exile it. You can't exile Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.)

name: Grip of Amnesia
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller exiles all cards from their graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Would you abandon your past to save your future?"
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Hapless Researcher
oracle_text: Sacrifice Hapless Researcher: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Scholars possess such lofty knowledge that it shouldn't be surprising when they fall.

name: Keep Watch
oracle_text: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
flavor_text: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

name: Laquatus's Disdain
oracle_text: Counter target spell cast from a graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "The first time was amusing, but now you're getting tiresome."

name: Lost in Thought
oracle_text: Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. Its controller may exile three cards from their graveyard for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

name: Mental Note
oracle_text: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Some minds are more open than others.

name: Mirror Wall
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{W}: Mirror Wall can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text:
"Breaking it would be about four hundred years bad luck."
—Nomad sentry

name: Mist of Stagnation
oracle_text: Permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a permanent for each card in their graveyard, then untaps those permanents.

name: Quiet Speculation
oracle_text: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles their library.
flavor_text:
"The best foresight is hindsight."
—Empress Llawan

name: Scalpelexis
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top four cards of their library. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.

name: Spelljack
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may play it without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)

name: Telekinetic Bonds
oracle_text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, you may tap or untap target permanent.
flavor_text:
"Nature's been fired. The oceans are under new management."
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Web of Inertia
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, that player may exile a card from their graveyard. If the player doesn't, creatures they control can't attack you this turn.
flavor_text: Cephalids specialize in lose-lose situations.

name: Wonder
oracle_text: Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.
flavor_text:
"The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."
—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Wormfang Behemoth
oracle_text: When Wormfang Behemoth enters the battlefield, exile all cards from your hand.
When Wormfang Behemoth leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

name: Wormfang Crab
oracle_text: Wormfang Crab can't be blocked.
When Wormfang Crab enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses a permanent you control other than Wormfang Crab and exiles it.
When Wormfang Crab leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Wormfang Drake
oracle_text: Flying
When Wormfang Drake enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile a creature you control other than Wormfang Drake.
When Wormfang Drake leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Wormfang Manta
oracle_text: Flying
When Wormfang Manta enters the battlefield, you skip your next turn.
When Wormfang Manta leaves the battlefield, you take an extra turn after this one.

name: Wormfang Newt
oracle_text: When Wormfang Newt enters the battlefield, exile a land you control.
When Wormfang Newt leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: Spawned by mages emulating the insane.

name: Wormfang Turtle
oracle_text: When Wormfang Turtle enters the battlefield, exile a land you control.
When Wormfang Turtle leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: Chainer's admirers keep his dreams alive.

name: Balthor the Defiled
oracle_text: Minion creatures get +1/+1.
{B}{B}{B}, Exile Balthor the Defiled: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: He remembers enough of his life to weep for what he has lost.

name: Cabal Therapy
oracle_text: Choose a nonland card name. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name.
Flashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Cabal Trainee
oracle_text: Sacrifice Cabal Trainee: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Ah, a faceshredder. Very rare. Nearly unstoppable. Good luck"
—Cabal instructor

name: Death Wish
oracle_text: You may choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Exile Death Wish.
flavor_text: He wished for power, but not for the longevity to abuse it.

name: Earsplitting Rats
oracle_text: When Earsplitting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
Discard a card: Regenerate Earsplitting Rats.
flavor_text: Rats come in one amount: too many.

name: Filth
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
As long as Filth is in your graveyard and you control a Swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.
flavor_text:
"As the portal closed, Filth oozed through. The stench of evil followed it in."
—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Grave Consequences
oracle_text: Each player may exile any number of cards from their graveyard. Then each player loses 1 life for each card in their graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"You call that a nightmare?"
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Guiltfeeder
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever Guiltfeeder attacks and isn't blocked, defending player loses 1 life for each card in their graveyard.

name: Masked Gorgon
oracle_text: Green creatures and white creatures have protection from Gorgons.
Threshold — Masked Gorgon has protection from green and from white as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Morality Shift
oracle_text: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The mind sings, though at times it sings a dirge.

name: Rats' Feast
oracle_text: Exile X target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor_text:
"That does it—I quit"
—Cabal grave robber

name: Stitch Together
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold — Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Sutured Ghoul
oracle_text: Trample
As Sutured Ghoul enters the battlefield, exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard.
Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.

name: Toxic Stench
oracle_text: Target nonblack creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Treacherous Vampire
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Treacherous Vampire attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you exile a card from your graveyard.
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Vampire gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Vampire dies, you lose 6 life."

name: Treacherous Werewolf
oracle_text: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Werewolf gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Werewolf dies, you lose 4 life."

name: Anger
oracle_text: Haste
As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
flavor_text:
"For its time as a mortal, Anger chose a shell of boiling rock."
—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Arcane Teachings
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor_text: Dwarves may teach at the speed of stone, but their results are solid.

name: Barbarian Bully
oracle_text: Discard a card at random: Barbarian Bully gets +2/+2 until end of turn unless a player has Barbarian Bully deal 4 damage to them. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text: "Out of my way"

name: Book Burning
oracle_text: Any player may have Book Burning deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, target player puts the top six cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: The wizard's spellbook was full of burning questions.

name: Breaking Point
oracle_text: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: "Enough"

name: Browbeat
oracle_text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to them. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
flavor_text:
"Even the threat of power has power."
—Jeska, warrior adept

name: Burning Wish
oracle_text: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.
flavor_text: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

name: Dwarven Bloodboiler
oracle_text: Tap an untapped Dwarf you control: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His battle cry unleashes an avalanche of dwarves.

name: Dwarven Driller
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target land unless its controller has Dwarven Driller deal 2 damage to them.
flavor_text:
"Drill the planet, it's no trouble:
Mining granite, making rubble."
—Dwarven drilling song

name: Dwarven Scorcher
oracle_text: Sacrifice Dwarven Scorcher: Dwarven Scorcher deals 1 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Dwarven Scorcher deal 2 damage to them.
flavor_text: Barbarians invented the blaze of glory. Dwarves perfected it.

name: Ember Shot
oracle_text: Ember Shot deals 3 damage to any target.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Dwarves bring poor coal to market, use good coal in their homes, and throw their best coal away.

name: Firecat Blitz
oracle_text: Create X 1/1 red Elemental Cat creature tokens with haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
Flashback—{R}{R}, Sacrifice X Mountains. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Flaring Pain
oracle_text: Damage can't be prevented this turn.
Flashback {R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text:
"I don't rub salt in wounds. I use sulfur."
—Matoc, lavamancer

name: Fledgling Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Fledgling Dragon gets +3/+3 and has "{R}: Fledgling Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

name: Goretusk Firebeast
oracle_text: When Goretusk Firebeast enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: As a youth, Kamahl took one for a pet. His hair has yet to grow back.

name: Infectious Rage
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
When enchanted creature dies, choose a creature at random Infectious Rage can enchant. Return Infectious Rage to the battlefield attached to that creature.

name: Jeska, Warrior Adept
oracle_text: First strike, haste
{T}: Jeska, Warrior Adept deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "My brother and I both come from Balthor's forge. Kamahl has a temper of fire. I have a temper of steel."

name: Lava Dart
oracle_text: Lava Dart deals 1 damage to any target.
Flashback—Sacrifice a Mountain. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Liberated Dwarf
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Liberated Dwarf: Target green creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Freed from their chains, these dwarves are bound only by honor.

name: Lightning Surge
oracle_text: Lightning Surge deals 4 damage to any target.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Lightning Surge deals 6 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.
Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Planar Chaos
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Planar Chaos.
Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If they lose the flip, counter that spell.

name: Shaman's Trance
oracle_text: Other players can't cast spells or play lands from their graveyards this turn. You may play cards from other players' graveyards this turn as though those cards were in your graveyard.

name: Soulgorger Orgg
oracle_text: Trample
When Soulgorger Orgg enters the battlefield, you lose all but 1 life.
When Soulgorger Orgg leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the life you lost when it entered the battlefield.

name: Spellgorger Barbarian
oracle_text: When Spellgorger Barbarian enters the battlefield, discard a card at random.
When Spellgorger Barbarian leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: The epidemic insanity had a lasting effect on certain barbarians—but no one noticed.

name: Swelter
oracle_text: Swelter deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures.
flavor_text: No circle has a beginning, but many have foreseeable ends.

name: Swirling Sandstorm
oracle_text: Threshold — Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text: As dust swept out, vultures swept in.

name: Worldgorger Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, trample
When Worldgorger Dragon enters the battlefield, exile all other permanents you control.
When Worldgorger Dragon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

name: Anurid Barkripper
oracle_text: Threshold — Anurid Barkripper gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text: When it croaks, so do you.

name: Anurid Swarmsnapper
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{1}{G}: Anurid Swarmsnapper can block an additional creature this turn.
flavor_text: Anurids have the problem of airborne invaders licked.

name: Battlefield Scrounger
oracle_text: Threshold — Put three cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library: Battlefield Scrounger gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Brawn
oracle_text: Trample
As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.
flavor_text:
"‘I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."
—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Canopy Claws
oracle_text: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Centaur Rootcaster
oracle_text: Whenever Centaur Rootcaster deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Crush of Wurms
oracle_text: Create three 6/6 green Wurm creature tokens.
Flashback {9}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Elephant Guide
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature dies, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
flavor_text: Nature's strength outlives the strong.

name: Epic Struggle
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures, you win the game.
flavor_text:
"If our foes will not listen to words, perhaps hooves and claws will make them take notice."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Erhnam Djinn
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: He provides a safe path to nowhere.

name: Exoskeletal Armor
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
flavor_text:
"We use only what we need—but in times of strife, our need becomes great."
—Centaur warrior

name: Folk Medicine
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each creature you control.
Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Sometimes the healers need healing.

name: Forcemage Advocate
oracle_text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Our unity renews our strength."

name: Genesis
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more."
—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Giant Warthog
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"When the Ancestor saw the cruelty her human children were capable of, Her fury shook the world. From this outburst sprang the warthogs."
—Nomad myth

name: Grizzly Fate
oracle_text: Create two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens.
Threshold — Create four 2/2 green Bear creature tokens instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Harvester Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land you control could produce.
flavor_text: "In the end, the same soil lies atop the field, within the mountain, and under the sea."

name: Ironshell Beetle
oracle_text: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Why waste time creating weapons? Nature provides us with all we need."
—Centaur warrior

name: Krosan Reclamation
oracle_text: Target player shuffles up to two target cards from their graveyard into their library.
Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Krosan Wayfarer
oracle_text: Sacrifice Krosan Wayfarer: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"The Krosan Forest lives, and druids are its seeds."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Living Wish
oracle_text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.
flavor_text: He wished for growth, but not for a way to control it.

name: Nantuko Tracer
oracle_text: When Nantuko Tracer enters the battlefield, you may put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
Your past is a map to where you will go.
—Nantuko teaching

oracle_text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

The hippo grows wings to fight the condor.

oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

flavor_text: The land drank power from the Mirari as though it had thirsted forever.
